fp.utils

Class Polynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • fp.utils.Polynomial

  • public class Polynomial
extends Object
    Class whose instantiations are polynomials, i.e of the form P(x) = 5x^3 + x^2 + 3x + 5 or.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Polynomial()
      Default constructor.
      Polynomial(long... coeffs)
      Default constructor.

      • exponentiation

        public Polynomial exponentiation(long exponent)
        Uses Polynomial.multiply to calculate powers of the given exponential.
        Parameters:
        exponent - The exponent used to calculate the power of the polynomial.
        Returns:
        The resulting polynomial.

      • modularExponentiation

        public Polynomial modularExponentiation(long exponent,
                                        long modulo)
        Uses Polynomial.multiply() and Polynomial.mod() to calculate the exponential of the polynomial when we take into account some modulus.
        Parameters:
        exponent - The exponent used to calculate the power of the polynomial.
        modulo - Modulo, modulo which we are calculating.
        Returns:
        The resulting polynomial.

      • mod

        public Polynomial mod(Polynomial polmod)
        Uses calculates the congruence of polynomial modulo some other polynomial.
        Parameters:
        polmod - The modulo. This is of the form x^n - a.
        Returns:
        The resulting polynomial.

      • mod

        public Polynomial mod(long n)
        Uses calculates the congruence of polynomial modulo some integer.
        Parameters:
        n - Modulo.
        Returns:
        The resulting polynomial.

      • polyEquals

        public boolean polyEquals(Polynomial p)
        Checks if two polynomials are the same.
        Parameters:
        p - The polynomial against which we are comparing this one.
        Returns:
        Truth value. If true, the polynomials are equal. If false, they are not.
